channel.title: Authors on Akshith's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Akshith's Portfolio

item.description:
I am a Data Scientist with the ability to work on Machine learning problems in python. Besides, I have a passion for storytelling by seeing the data. Mostly my work will be AI-related concepts dealing with real-world problems. And, I had completed few different projects in data science using python. Learning new technologies and concepts in AI was my keen interest which usually growing in me daily.

My latest achievement is cracking the TensorFlow Developer Certification provided by Google.

Apart from these, I have an interest in writing the things that are learned in data science. And I started learning these concepts through online platforms which made my skills strong in this field as a self-learner, it is hard to grab the things. So, I decided to write blogs about data science in easy to understand with resources that help others.
